p: There are synthetic agents available now against HCV, but they have a lack of specific treatment for HCV therapy. Another concern in these cases is the presence of severe side effects and reported poor response rates. To manage and to get these problems under control for better treatment against HCV, new potential agents to be explored. As we see in the cases of other viruses discussed in the review, there are many promising natural products, which have led to the discovery of potent HCV inhibitors.
